data.comment: The match has started at Stadio San Paolo.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 4, In Naples Napoli attack through Dries Mertens. The finish is off target, however.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 9, Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Sassuolo in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Victor Osimhen gets his shot on target but fails to score for Napoli.
In the minute 12, Napoli's Giovanni Di Lorenzo has run offside.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Napoli throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli's Kalidou Koulibaly misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
In the minute 22, Free kick for Napoli in the half of Sassuolo.
Giacomo Raspadori (Sassuolo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Sassuolo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Napoli's half?
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Sassuolo.
Napoli's Dries Mertens gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Maurizio Mariani awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Napoli have a goal kick.
Sassuolo have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
Napoli's Victor Osimhen breaks free at Stadio San Paolo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
In the minute 33, Napoli pushes forward through Fabian Ruiz, whose finish on goal is saved.
Napoli drive upfield and Matteo Politano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
Free kick Napoli.
In the minute 36, Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Napoli.
Dries Mertens (Napoli) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 40, Napoli's Hirving Lozano gets in a shot on goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
In the minute 43, Jeremie Boga for Sassuolo drives towards goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sassuolo.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 45, In Naples, Victor Osimhen (Napoli) misses the target with a header.
Maurizio Mariani awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Maurizio Mariani will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway at Stadio San Paolo.
In Naples Sassuolo drive forward through Rogerio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 47, Throw-in Sassuolo.
Manuel Locatelli for Sassuolo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Napoli goal kick.
Victor Osimhen (Napoli) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Sassuolo.
In the minute 49, Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli has been booked in Naples.
In the minute 49, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gian Marco Ferrari for Sassuolo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Gian Marco Ferrari for Sassuolo is back on the field again.
In the minute 51, Napoli's Dries Mertens gets in a shot on goal at Stadio San Paolo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Maurizio Mariani signals a throw-in for Napoli, close to Sassuolo's area.
In the minute 53, Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Victor Osimhen (Napoli) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
In the minute 54, Napoli's Kalidou Koulibaly attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Maurizio Mariani awards Sassuolo a goal kick.
Sassuolo have been given a penalty...
In the minute 59, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Manuel Locatelli.
Throw-in for Napoli in the half of Sassuolo.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stadio San Paolo, Kostas Manolas has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 62, Sassuolo's Manuel Locatelli is back in action after a slight knock.
Manuel Locatelli is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Napoli get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sassuolo's half?
Sassuolo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Ball safe as Napoli is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hirving Lozano of Napoli is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Andrea Petagna is on a sub for Hirving Lozano for Napoli.
In Naples Napoli attack through Dries Mertens. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Naples.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
The away team have replaced Hamed Junior Traore with Gregoire Defrel. This is the first substitution made today by Roberto De Zerbi.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 70, Maurizio Mariani signals a Napoli throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Napoli.
Gennaro Gattuso is making the team's second substitution at Stadio San Paolo with Eljif Elmas replacing Dries Mertens.
In the minute 70, Mario Rui is replacing Elseid Hysaj for the home team.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli drive upfield and Kalidou Koulibaly gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sassuolo defender.
In the minute 73, Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
Corner awarded to Napoli.
Napoli push upfield and Kostas Manolas gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Sassuolo defence.
In the minute 74, Napoli drives forward and Victor Osimhen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Sassuolo.
In the minute 76, Sassuolo to take a throw-in in Napoli territory.
Maurizio Mariani awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Sassuolo in their own half.
Mert Muldur is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Mert Muldur is back on his feet again.
Piotr Zielinski is replacing Matteo Politano for Napoli at Stadio San Paolo.
In the minute 80, Napoli's Mario Rui breaks free at Stadio San Paolo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sassuolo have a goal kick.
Roberto De Zerbi (Sassuolo) is making a second substitution, with Pedro Obiang replacing Jeremie Boga.
Napoli have been awarded a corner by Maurizio Mariani.
In the minute 81, Giorgos Kyriakopoulos (Sassuolo) has replaced the possibly injured Mert Muldur.
Napoli attack but Giovanni Di Lorenzo's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Sassuolo at Stadio San Paolo.
Giorgos Kyriakopoulos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sassuolo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Naples.
In the minute 84, Corner awarded to Napoli.
Maurizio Mariani signals a Napoli throw-in in Sassuolo's half.
Sassuolo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Napoli.
In the minute 87, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Vlad Chiriches.
Mehdi Bourabia (Sassuolo) has replaced the possibly injured Vlad Chiriches at Stadio San Paolo.
Roberto De Zerbi (Sassuolo) is making a fifth substitution, with Marlon replacing Giacomo Raspadori.
In the minute 89, Sassuolo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Naples a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Napoli in the half of Sassuolo.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Naples.
Victor Osimhen for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Sassuolo in the half of Napoli.
Maurizio Mariani signals a free kick to Napoli.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Napoli surge into the attack at Stadio San Paolo but Victor Osimhen’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sassuolo goal kick.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
Mehdi Bourabia for Sassuolo has been booked by Maurizio Mariani and receives a first yellow card.
Napoli's David Ospina has been booked in Naples.
Goal! Sassuolo extend their lead to 0-2 through Maxime Lopez.
